ProjectTitle: De NEural BAsis of Thermoception (NEBAT): een gecombineerde intracerebrale elektrofysiologische en systeemneurowetenschappelijke studie
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/11/2024
Personal data: please ensure that you also register the processing of personal data at KU Leuven via the UZL ethics committee GDPR questionnaire or via PRET, for more information see https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index. 
Storage: This section is not very clear, what is the code that is developed?  What do you mean by "a server located in a private space"? You mention many different storage solutions, would it not be easier to use a limited number of KU Leuven or UZ Leuven solutions? See https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en or contact your local IT team since UZL storage solutions are not included in this guide. If you are using personal devices or other non-KU/UZ Leuven storage solutions please explain how data on these locations will be backed up and secured. 
Preservation: Please note that KU Leuven RDR is a repository for data sharing, it will preserve your shared data as well, but can not be used for long term storage only, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr; consult the storage guide for other solutions, or contact your local IT team (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en)
Sharing: Please answer the second question where you are asked to explain why data will not be shared, clarify whether data will be shared or not, you mention not to share your data under the first question, but under when that data will be available you answer that they will be available upon publication.
